channel.title: Coder / Developer needed please
channel.description: Hello i am searching for a determined and helpful developer/coder to join me and help and teach me little bits here and there in regards to my server i currently have a spawn pk server and i am looking for someone to assist me in setting up teleports shops etc so the server can be pk based when you are in the mood and then when your tired of pking you can socialize and skill and other little bits if you are interested please feel free to message me on here reply to this thread or add me and talk to me through skype my skype name is --- harry.buxton6 thankyou for your time and consideration

item.title: Coder / Developer needed please

item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Pretty much all of the above

Read full topic

item.title: Coder / Developer needed please
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Asking for a developer to ‘teach you’ as you work on the rsps never happens. You end up watching them do everything while you do nothing, and learn nothing.

Take the hands on approach. Read some Java, and then some more. And after that, maybe a bit more. Then start working on your rsps. You need, at minimal, to understand the basics of Java if you ever want to be able to go anywhere with your rsps.

If there’s something you don’t understand, google it before posting “I NEED HALP”. 95% of the time, there’s an answer. The other 5%? You googled it wrong.

Read full topic
